SEARCH
Package dev.bjdelacruz.services

Interface DatabaseService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AzureSqlService, DynamoDbService
public interface DatabaseService
Implementations of this interface will provide CRUD operations against a database.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

    connect(DatabaseType databaseType)
    Connects to a database of the given type.
    static DatabaseService
    connect(DatabaseType databaseType, String databaseUrl, boolean enableNotifications)
    Connects to a database of the given type at the given URL with notifications either enabled or disabled.

    • create

      ChamorroDictionaryEntry create(ChamorroDictionaryEntry entry)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • read

      Result<ChamorroDictionaryEntry> read(Query query)
      Reads one or more dictionary entries from the database.
      Parameters:
      query - An object that contains information for a query.
      Returns:
      An object that contains the results of the query.

    • isHealthy

      boolean isHealthy()
      Returns true if the database is online and ready to receive requests, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      True if the database is online, false otherwise.

    • connect

      static DatabaseService connect(DatabaseType databaseType)
      Connects to a database of the given type.
      Parameters:
      databaseType - The type of the database to which to connect.
      Returns:
      An instance of a DatabaseService.

    • connect

      static DatabaseService connect(DatabaseType databaseType, String databaseUrl, boolean enableNotifications)
      Connects to a database of the given type at the given URL with notifications either enabled or disabled.
      Parameters:
      databaseType - The type of the database to which to connect.
      databaseUrl - The URL of the database.
      enableNotifications - True to enable notifications from Amazon SNS, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      An instance of a DatabaseService.

    • getDatabaseUrl

      static String getDatabaseUrl(DatabaseType databaseType)
      Returns the URL for a database based on its type. The URL is defined in an environment variable.
      Parameters:
      databaseType - The type of the database, which determines which URL to use.
      Returns:
      The URL of the database.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an environment variable is not defined.

    • getTableName

      static String getTableName()
      Returns the name of the database table, which is stored in the TABLE_NAME environment variable.
      Returns:
      The name of the database table.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an environment variable is not defined.
